Field Note: Required so I can create a project and add you to it

Field Label:
This is to confirm that your request to join this challenge has been received. 

A project titled "[project_title]" has been created for you. 

Once you log in to REDCap, you will see your project and you can change its title and information.

Note: If you want to use the API rather than import/export module to manage your project you will need to request the API token within REDCap application

As part of the challenge, you will be asked to respond to surveys developed and sent by other participants. 

Do you agree to receiving such surveys from other participants in the challenge to the email you provided earlier? ([email])

Please enter in this space a phrase that would be shared with the other participants and that would be known only to you and to them.

What is this for? As part of this challenge, you will be receiving surveys from other participants. To assure you that the surveys you will be receiving are from other vetted fellow participants, we will show this phrase in those surveys. Don't type any private information like passwords.
Field Note: "He-llo from the other siiiiiide" ... is over played and probably isn't a good private phrase
